title: My Shop not showing
body: Logged on to see what I got in "My Shop" but for some reason it is not showing. I reset my LoL and it still doesn't show up.

replies.body: Why isn't Kayne appearing in My Shop?
I was able to load mine just fine, that's pretty weird.  Are you able to locate your shop, just nothing is loading?  Can you upload a screenshot for me, so I can better understand what's going on?

Same issue here. I got on to check it after my friends showed me theirs, but I haven't been able to see it. Client restart and full PC restart have happened between checks. SS here.

http://puu.sh/xHbai/820468a6d1.jpg

Thanks for the screenshot!  You're on the wrong tab, silly.  Swap over from Worlds to Overview.  See here:

https://imgur.com/a/XGbFS
TIL how blind/unobservant I am. Thanks.
Dude I did the same exact thing and ended up this thread because of it dont feel bad lol.
I literally did the same thing, we are all blind xD {{sticker:sg-lulu}}
